headline: This Is Why Hershey's Sell-Off Is a Buying Opportunity for Growth Investors
summary: Hershey faces cost headwinds that are leading to a dramatic earnings decline.  Despite its current challenges, Hershey continues to invest for the future.  Shares of The Hershey Company (NYSE: HSY) are in a deep downturn, off over 40% from their 2023 highs.
